hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #cow swallowed by Jabu Jabu# gifts #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Goron Tunic#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #House of Skulltula#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Deku Shield#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Granny's Potion Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #the Giant's Knife#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #6# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Hylian Shield#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

ZF (Jabu).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amid #larvae in Dodongo's Cavern# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Zora Tunic# and #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Larvae Room Chest
Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Larvae Room
